data.name: Vacant Kingdom
data.detailed_description:
Vacant Kingdom is a bullet hell action-RPG. Its combat takes inspiration from Japanese arcade shooters, but the story and world are structured like an action-RPG. You'll explore different locations, make friends, solve puzzles, and acquire items. Bosses will put your skills to the test, but you'll only have to defeat each one once.



In Vacant Kingdom you explore a whimsical yet desolate land and try to rally its adrift people by solving their problems. On the way you'll meet a colourful cast of characters. Like a chef who only knows one recipe, a nefarious wizard who wields the dark power of obtuse riddles, and a robot who is programmed to teach the world about insects.

Key Gamer Features

  • Challenging bullet hell gameplay in a unique action-RPG framework.
  • 4-6 hours of gameplay.
  • Defeat 9 fearsome bosses.
  • 3 levels of difficulty to suit beginners and veterans alike.
  • Discover and equip a variety of equipment and weapons.
  • Explore and uncover its secrets of a haunted resort, an abandoned bathhouse, and more.
  • Solve perplexing puzzles to proceed through the world.
  • Befriend a cast of quirky characters.

data.short_description: Vacant Kingdom is a synthesis of bullet hell and story-driven action-RPG. Explore a whimsical yet desolate land and rally its adrift people by solving their problems.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11, 10, 8, 7, or Vista
  • Processor: Intel i3 or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics, GeForce 6xxx, Radeon HD 2xxx, or newer
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any should work perfectly.
  • Additional Notes: Blue LEDs inside case.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11, 10, 8, 7, or Vista
  • Processor: modern-ish Intel i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything made in the last decade.
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any should work perfectly.
  • Additional Notes: Red LEDs inside case.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics, GeForce 6xxx, Radeon HD 2xxx, or newer
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any should work perfectly.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything made in the last decade.
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any should work perfectly.
